story.title: How to Play CheckMate Advance
story.text: Welcome to the Blunder Dojo! Before you hit the boards, let’s cover the basics...

story.title: Your Goal
story.text: Score as many points as possible. You gain points and shop credits by completing games of chess

story.title: Buffed Pieces
story.text: Purchase upgrades in the shop to improve your scoring potential.

story.title: And do remember
story.text: Only one way out… Win. Or stay forever.
